monsters.name: squirrel
monsters.description: A small woodland animal.

monsters.name: rabbit
monsters.description:
A cute wiggling nose, cotton tail, and
delicious flesh.

monsters.name: deer
monsters.description: A large buck, fast-moving and strong.

monsters.name: moose
monsters.description: A buck of the largest deer species.

monsters.name: wolf
monsters.description: A grey wolf. A vicious and fast pack hunter.

monsters.name: coyote
monsters.description: An eastern coyote, also called tweed wolf. It is an hybrid of grey wolves and the smaller western coyotes.

monsters.name: bear
monsters.description: An american black bear. Remember, only YOU can prevent forest fires.

monsters.name: cougar
monsters.description: A vicious and fast hunter.

monsters.name: crow
monsters.description: A small woodland animal.

monsters.name: dog
monsters.description: A medium-sized domesticated dog, gone feral.

monsters.name: cat
monsters.description: A small domesticated cat, gone feral.

monsters.name: ant larva
monsters.description:
The size of a large cat, this pulsating mass
of glistening white flesh turns your stomach.

monsters.name: giant ant
monsters.description:
A red ant the size of a crocodile. It is
covered in chitinous armor, and has a pair of
vicious mandibles.

monsters.name: soldier ant
monsters.description:
Darker in color than the other ants, this
more aggresive variety has even larger
mandibles.

monsters.name: queen ant
monsters.description:
This ant has a long, bloated thorax, bulging
with hundreds of small ant eggs.  It moves
slowly, tending to nearby eggs and laying
still more.

monsters.name: fungal insect
monsters.description:
This insect is pale gray in color, its
chitin weakened by the fungus sprouting
from every joint on its body.

monsters.name: giant fly
monsters.description:
A large housefly the size of a small dog.
It buzzes around incessantly.

monsters.name: giant bee
monsters.description:
A honey bee the size of a small dog. It
buzzes angrily through the air, dagger-
sized sting pointed forward.

monsters.name: giant wasp
monsters.description:
An evil-looking, slender-bodied wasp with
a vicious sting on its abdomen.

monsters.name: graboid
monsters.description:
A hideous slithering beast with a tri-
sectional mouth that opens to reveal
hundreds of writhing tongues. Most of its
enormous body is hidden underground.

monsters.name: giant worm
monsters.description:
Half of this monster is emerging from a
hole in the ground. It looks like a huge
earthworm, but the end has split into a
large, fanged mouth.

monsters.name: half worm
monsters.description: A portion of a giant worm that is still alive.

monsters.name: sludge crawler
monsters.description: A sluglike creature, eight feet long and the width of a refrigerator, it's black body glistens as it oozes it's way along the ground. Eye stalks occassionally push their way out of the oily mass and look around.

monsters.name: zombie
monsters.description:
A human body, stumbling slowly forward on
uncertain legs, possessed with an unstoppable
rage.

monsters.name: zombie cop
monsters.description:
A human body, encapsulated in tough riot
armour, this zombie was clearly a cop gearing
up to fight the infection.

monsters.name: shrieker zombie
monsters.description:
This zombie's jaw has been torn off, leaving
a gaping hole from mid-neck up.

monsters.name: spitter zombie
monsters.description:
This zombie's mouth is deformed into a round
spitter, and its body throbs with a dense
yellow fluid.

monsters.name: shocker zombie
monsters.description:
This zombie's flesh is pale blue, and it
occasionally crackles with small bolts of
lightning.

monsters.name: smoker zombie
monsters.description:
This zombie emits a constant haze of
thick, obfuscating smoke.

monsters.name: swimmer zombie
monsters.description:
This zombie's hands and feet are
webbed, and it is clad in swimwear.

monsters.name: zombie dog
monsters.description:
This deformed, sinewy canine stays close to
the ground, loping forward faster than most
humans ever could.

monsters.name: zombie brute
monsters.description:
A hideous beast of a zombie, bulging with
distended muscles on both arms and legs.

monsters.name: zombie hulk
monsters.description:
A zombie that has somehow grown to the size of
6 men, with arms as wide as a trash can.

monsters.name: fungal zombie
monsters.description:
A diseased zombie. Fungus sprouts from its
mouth and eyes, and thick gray mold grows all
over its translucent flesh.

monsters.name: boomer
monsters.description:
A bloated zombie sagging with fat. It emits a
horrible odor, and putrid, pink sludge drips
from its mouth.

monsters.name: fungal boomer
monsters.description:
A bloated zombie that is coated with slimy
gray mold. Its flesh is translucent and gray,
and it dribbles a gray sludge from its mouth.

monsters.name: skeleton
monsters.description:
A skeleton picked clean of all but a few
rotten scraps of flesh, somehow still in
motion.

monsters.name: zombie necromancer
monsters.description:
A zombie with jet black skin and glowing red
eyes.  As you look at it, you're gripped by a
feeling of dread and terror.

monsters.name: zombie scientist
monsters.description:
A zombie wearing a tattered lab coat and
some sort of utility belt.  It looks weaker
than most zombies, but more resourceful too.

monsters.name: zombie soldier
monsters.description:
This zombie was clearly a soldier before.
Its tattered armor gives it strong defense,
and it is much more physically fit than
most zombies.

monsters.name: grabber zombie
monsters.description:
This zombie seems to have slightly longer
than ordinary arms, and constantly gropes
at its surroundings as it moves.

monsters.name: master zombie
monsters.description:
This zombie seems to have a cloud of black
dust surrounding it.  It also seems to have
a better grasp of movement than most...

monsters.name: scarred zombie
monsters.description:
Hundreds of bee stings have given this zombie
a thick covering of scar tissue, it will be
much harder to damage than an ordinary zombie
but moves a bit slower

monsters.name: child zombie
monsters.description:
A horrifying child zombie, you feel
a twinge of remorse looking at it.

monsters.name: jabberwock
monsters.description:
An amalgamation of putrid human and animal
parts that have become fused in this golem
of flesh.  The eyes of all the heads dart
rapidly and the mouths scream or groan.

monsters.name: triffid
monsters.description:
A plant that grows as high as your head,
with one thick, bark-coated stalk
supporting a flower-like head with a sharp
sting within.

monsters.name: young triffid
monsters.description:
A small triffid, only a few feet tall. It
has not yet developed bark, but its sting
is still sharp and deadly.

monsters.name: queen triffid
monsters.description:
A very large triffid, with a particularly
vicious sting and thick bark.  As it
moves, plant matter drops off its body
and immediately takes root.

monsters.name: creeper hub
monsters.description:
A thick stalk, rooted to the ground.
It rapidly sprouts thorny vines in all
directions.

monsters.name: creeping vine
monsters.description:
A thorny vine.  It twists wildly as
it grows, spreading rapidly.

monsters.name: biollante
monsters.description:
A thick stalk topped with a purple
flower.  The flower's petals are closed,
and pulsate ominously.

monsters.name: vinebeast
monsters.description:
This appears to be a mass of vines, moving
with surprising speed.  It is so thick and
tangled that you cannot see what lies in
the middle.

monsters.name: triffid heart
monsters.description:
A knot of roots that looks bizarrely like a
heart.  It beats slowly with sap, powering
the root walls around it.

monsters.name: fungaloid
monsters.description:
A pale white fungus, one meaty gray stalk
supporting a bloom at the top. A few
tendrils extend from the base, allowing
mobility and a weak attack.

monsters.name: fungaloid
monsters.description:
A pale white fungus, one meaty gray stalk
supporting a bloom at the top. A few
tendrils extend from the base, allowing
mobility and a weak attack.

monsters.name: young fungaloid
monsters.description:
A fungal tendril just a couple feet tall.  Its
exterior is hardened into a leathery bark and
covered in thorns; it also moves faster than
full-grown fungaloids.

monsters.name: spore
monsters.description:
A wispy spore, about the size of a fist,
wafting on the breeze.

monsters.name: fungal spire
monsters.description:
An enormous fungal spire, towering 30 feet
above the ground.  It pulsates slowly,
continuously growing new defenses.

monsters.name: fungal wall
monsters.description:
A veritable wall of fungus, grown as a
natural defense by the fungal spire. It
looks very tough, and spews spores at an
alarming rate.

monsters.name: blob
monsters.description:
A black blob of viscous goo that oozes
across the ground like a mass of living
oil.

monsters.name: small blob
monsters.description:
A small blob of viscous goo that oozes
across the ground like a mass of living
oil.

monsters.name: C.H.U.D.
monsters.description:
Cannibalistic Humanoid Underground Dweller.
A human, turned pale and mad from years in
the subways.

monsters.name: one-eyed mutant
monsters.description:
A relatively humanoid mutant with purple
hair and a grapefruit-sized bloodshot eye.

monsters.name: crawler mutant
monsters.description:
Two or three humans fused together somehow,
slowly dragging their thick-hided, hideous
body across the ground.

monsters.name: sewer fish
monsters.description:
A large green fish, it's mouth lined with
three rows of razor-sharp teeth.

monsters.name: sewer snake
monsters.description:
A large snake, turned pale yellow from its
underground life.

monsters.name: sewer rat
monsters.description:
A large, mangey rat with red eyes.  It
scampers quickly across the ground, squeaking
hungrily.

monsters.name: rat king
monsters.description:
A group of several rats, their tails
knotted together in a filthy mass.  A wave
of nausea washes over you in its presence.

monsters.name: giant mosquito
monsters.description:
An enormous mosquito, fluttering erratically,
its face dominated by a long, spear-tipped
proboscis.

monsters.name: giant dragonfly
monsters.description:
A ferocious airborne predator, flying swiftly
through the air, its mouth a cluster of fangs.

monsters.name: giant centipede
monsters.description:
A meter-long centipede, moving swiftly on
dozens of thin legs, a pair of venomous
pincers attached to its head.

monsters.name: giant frog
monsters.description:
A thick-skinned green frog.  It eyes you
much as you imagine it might eye an insect.

monsters.name: giant slug
monsters.description:
A gigantic slug, the size of a small car.
It moves slowly, dribbling acidic goo from
its fang-lined mouth.

monsters.name: dermatik larva
monsters.description:
A fat, white grub the size of your foot, with
a set of mandibles that look more suited for
digging than fighting.

monsters.name: dermatik
monsters.description:
A wasp-like flying insect, smaller than most
mutated wasps.  It does not looke very
threatening, but has a large ovipositor in
place of a sting.

monsters.name: wolf spider
monsters.description:
A large, brown spider, which moves quickly
and aggresively.

monsters.name: web spider
monsters.description:
A yellow spider the size of a dog.  It lives
in webs, waiting for prey to become
entangled before pouncing and biting.

monsters.name: jumping spider
monsters.description:
A small, almost cute-looking spider.  It
leaps so quickly that it almost appears to
instantaneously move from one place to
another.

monsters.name: trap door spider
monsters.description:
A large spider with a bulbous thorax.  It
creates a subterranean nest and lies in
wait for prey to fall in and become trapped
in its webs.

monsters.name: black widow
monsters.description:
A spider with a characteristic red
hourglass on its black carapace.  It is
known for its highly toxic venom.

monsters.name: dark wyrm
monsters.description:
A huge, black worm, its flesh glistening
with an acidic, blue slime.  It has a gaping
round mouth lined with dagger-like teeth.

monsters.name: Amigara horror
monsters.description:
A spindly body, standing at least 15 feet
tall.  It looks vaguely human, but its face is
grotesquely stretched out, and its limbs are
distorted to the point of being tentacles.

monsters.name: dog
monsters.description: A medium-sized domesticated dog, gone feral.

monsters.name: tentacle dog
monsters.description:
A dog's body with a mass of ropy, black
tentacles extending from its head.

monsters.name: Thing
monsters.description:
An amorphous black creature which seems to
sprout tentacles rapidly.

monsters.name: human snail
monsters.description: A large snail, with an oddly human face.

monsters.name: twisted body
monsters.description:
A human body, but with its limbs, neck, and
hair impossibly twisted.

monsters.name: vortex
monsters.description:
A twisting spot in the air, with some kind
of morphing mass at its center.

monsters.name: flying polyp
monsters.description:
An amorphous mass of twisting black flesh
that flies through the air swiftly.

monsters.name: hunting horror
monsters.description:
A ropy, worm-like creature that flies on
bat-like wings. Its form continually
shifts and changes, twitching and
writhing.

monsters.name: Mi-go
monsters.description:
A pinkish, fungoid crustacean-like
creature with numerous pairs of clawed
appendages and a head covered with waving
antennae.

monsters.name: yugg
monsters.description:
An enormous white flatworm writhing
beneath the earth. Poking from the
ground is a bulbous head dominated by a
pink mouth, lined with rows of fangs.

monsters.name: gelatinous blob
monsters.description:
A shapeless blob the size of a cow.  It
oozes slowly across the ground, small
chunks falling off of its sides.

monsters.name: flaming eye
monsters.description:
An eyeball the size of an easy chair and
covered in rolling blue flames. It floats
through the air.

monsters.name: kreck
monsters.description:
A small humanoid, the size of a dog, with
twisted red flesh and a distended neck. It
scampers across the ground, panting and
grunting.

monsters.name: gracken
monsters.description:
An eldritch creature, shuffling
along, its hands twitching so
fast they appear as nothing but
blurs.

monsters.name: blank body
monsters.description:
This looks like a human body, but its
flesh is snow-white and its face has no
features save for a perfectly round
mouth.

monsters.name: Gozu
monsters.description:
A beast with the body of a slightly-overweight
man and the head of a cow.  It walks slowly,
milky white drool dripping from its mouth,
wearing only a pair of white underwear.

monsters.name: shadow
monsters.description:
A strange dark area in the area.  It whispers
softly as it moves.

monsters.name: breather
monsters.description:
A strange, immobile pink goo.  It seems to
be breathing slowly.

monsters.name: breather
monsters.description:
A strange, immobile pink goo.  It seems to
be breathing slowly.

monsters.name: shadow snake
monsters.description: A large snake, translucent black.

monsters.name: dementia
monsters.description:
An insane individual with many bloody holes
on the sides of their shaved head.  Some form
of lobotomy has left it with a partially re-
animated brain.

monsters.name: homunculus
monsters.description:
A pale white man with a physically flawless athletic
body and shaved head.  His eyes are completely black
as bloody tears pour forth from them.

monsters.name: blood sacrifice
monsters.description:
This poor victim was sliced open and bled to
death long ago.  Yet, chained down it thrashes
in eternal misery from its tortures.

monsters.name: flesh angel
monsters.description:
Slender and terrifying, this gigantic man lacks
any skin yet moves swiftly and gracefully without
it.  Wings of flesh protrude uselessly from his
back and a third eye dominates his forehead.

monsters.name: eyebot
monsters.description:
A roughly spherical robot that hovers about
five feet of the ground.  Its front side is
dominated by a huge eye and a flash bulb.
Frequently used for reconaissance.

monsters.name: manhack
monsters.description:
A fist-sized robot that flies swiftly through
the air.  It's covered with whirring blades
and has one small, glowing red eye.

monsters.name: skitterbot
monsters.description:
A robot with an insectoid design, about
the size of a small dog.  It skitters
quickly across the ground, two electric
prods at the ready.

monsters.name: secubot
monsters.description:
A boxy robot about four feet high.  It moves
slowly on a set of treads, and is armed with
a large machine gun type weapon.  It is
heavily armored.

monsters.name: hazmatbot
monsters.description:
A utility robot designed for hazardous
conditions.  Its only means to stop intruders
appears to involve thrashing around one of its
multiple legs.

monsters.name: copbot
monsters.description:
A blue-painted robot that moves quickly on a
set of three omniwheels.  It has a nightstick
readied, and appears to be well-armored.

monsters.name: molebot
monsters.description:
A snake-shaped robot that tunnels through the
ground slowly.  When it emerges from the
ground it can attack with its large, spike-
covered head.

monsters.name: tripod robot
monsters.description:
A 8-foot-tall robot that walks on three long
legs.  It has a pair of spiked tentacles, as
well as a flamethrower mounted on its head.

monsters.name: chicken walker
monsters.description:
A 10-foot-tall, heavily-armored robot that
walks on a pair of legs with the knees
facing backwards.  It's armed with a
nasty-looking machine gun.

monsters.name: tankbot
monsters.description:
This fearsome robot is essentially an
autonomous tank.  It moves surprisingly fast
on its treads, and is armed with a variety of
deadly weapons.

monsters.name: turret
monsters.description:
A small, round turret which extends from
the floor.  Two SMG barrels swivel 360
degrees.

monsters.name: exploder
monsters.description:
A small, round turret which extends from
the floor.  Two SMG barrels swivel 360
degrees.

monsters.name: zombie
monsters.description:
A human body, stumbling slowly forward on
uncertain legs, possessed with an
unstoppable rage.

monsters.name: giant bee
monsters.description:
A honey bee the size of a small dog. It
buzzes angrily through the air, dagger-
sized sting pointed forward.

monsters.name: giant ant
monsters.description:
A red ant the size of a crocodile. It is
covered in chitinous armor, and has a
pair of vicious mandibles.

monsters.name: your mother
monsters.description: Mom?

monsters.name: generator
monsters.description:
Your precious generator, noisily humming
away.  Defend it at all costs!
